articles.content: The Instagram account of the European Space Agency is filled with pictures of galaxies and space. These pictures shared on the account often leave netizens amazed. In the latest post, ESA has shared … [+1800 chars]

articles.author: Morgan McFall-Johnsen
articles.title: A European-Japanese spacecraft snapped the clearest photo of Mercury in 6 years as it flew past the planet - Yahoo News
articles.description: The BepiColombo spacecraft just flew past Mercury — its ultimate destination — for the first time. The resulting photos reveal a moon-like surface.
articles.content:
Mercury is finally back in the spotlight, with a space probe zooming past its cratered surface for the first time in six years.
As it flew past Mercury on Friday, the BepiColombo spacecraft snapped … [+2722 chars]
